            <div style="margin-left:104px;">
            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">
                    <input name="cb" value="10945467" type="checkbox" PatentId="10945467"  SQH='201310473267' MC='视频检索方法及系统' />[发明]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/201310473267' target='_blank'><font class='rh'>视频检索</font>方法及系统 - <font size="-1">201310473267.8</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicopending" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201310473267');" style="cursor:pointer;">审中-实审</div>
    
                <br />
            </h2>
            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">
                申请人：<a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=SQR%3A(%22%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%A5%87%E8%89%BA%E4%B8%96%E7%BA%AA%E7%A7%91%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%22)' target=_blank>北京奇艺世纪科技有限公司</a>  - 申请日：2013-10-11 - 主分类号：<a href='/IPC/Code/G06F17-30' target='_blank'>G06F17/30(2006.01)I</a><br />
            </span>
            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:本发明实施例提供的一种<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>方法及系统，可以预先建立存储有视频信息及其对应的索引图片的<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>库，从而可以使用户通过图片进行<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>。当用户并不知悉视频名称时，可以方便的对该视频进行拍摄或提取该视频的视频帧进行<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>，从而获得自己所需要...<br></span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlockE">
            
            </span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlock">

            <div style="margin-left:104px;">
            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">

            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:本发明实施例提供的一种<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>方法及系统，可以根据视频帧的相似度将用于检索的源视频拆分为多个子视频，并对每个子视频分析得到子视频的特征图像，使用子视频的特征图像来进行<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>。在检索时，本发明可以根据图像相似度及播放顺序是否一致确定所要检索...<br></span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlockE">
            
            </span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlock">

            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">
                    <input name="cb" value="14270743" type="checkbox" PatentId="14270743"  SQH='201280076837' MC='视频检索方法和装置' />[发明]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/201280076837' target='_blank'><font class='rh'>视频检索</font>方法和装置 - <font size="-1">201280076837.3</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicopending" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201280076837');" style="cursor:pointer;">审中-实审</div>

            </h2>
            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">
                申请人：<a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=SQR%3A(%22%E6%B1%A4%E5%A7%86%E9%80%8A%E8%AE%B8%E5%8F%AF%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%22)' target=_blank>汤姆逊许可公司</a>  - 申请日：2012-11-30 - 主分类号：<a href='/IPC/Code/G06F17-30' target='_blank'>G06F17/30(2006.01)I</a><br />
            </span>
            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:本发明提出了一种用于<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>的方法和装置。所述方法包括：提供用户界面，所述用户界面用于用户输入与被检索视频相关的文字查询条件；基于所述文字查询条件进行基于文字的图像搜索以提供与所述视频相关的多个图像；基于用户从所述多个图像中选择的一个图像进...<br></span>

                <div style="float:left;border:1px solid #BBBBBB;padding:2px;margin:2px 12px 2px 1px;width:82px;height:122px;" >

            <div style="margin-left:104px;">
            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">
                    <input name="cb" value="13817548" type="checkbox" PatentId="13817548"  SQH='201510111724' MC='一种视频检索方法及装置' />[发明]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/201510111724' target='_blank'>一种<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>方法及装置 - <font size="-1">201510111724.8</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicopending" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201510111724');" style="cursor:pointer;">审中-实审</div>
    
                <br />
            </h2>
            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">
                申请人：<a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=SQR%3A(%22%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E4%B8%96%E7%BA%AA%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E5%AE%BD%E5%B8%A6%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E4%B8%AD%E5%BF%83%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%22)' target=_blank>北京世纪互联宽带数据中心有限公司</a>  - 申请日：2015-03-13 - 主分类号：<a href='/IPC/Code/G06F17-30' target='_blank'>G06F17/30(2006.01)I</a><br />
            </span>
            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:本申请提供了一种<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>方法及装置，获取目标视频片段的视频距离轨迹，其中包括目标视频片段中的各个视频单元的线性拟合特征，依据线性拟合特征，计算各个视频单元与样本视频片段中的各个视频单元之间的内容相似度，并依据内容相似度，确定目标视频片段与样...<br></span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlockE">
            
            </span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlock">
            <img src="/content/images/patent/icon-normal.gif" class="tooltiplink" Link="/Home/Tooltip/201510111724" SQH="201510111724.8" style="padding:0px;margin:0px;"/>&nbsp;
            
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="sipolink('/Home/ViewPdfChoice/201510111724')">阅读</a> - <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="sipolink('/Home/DownloadChoice/201510111724')">下载</a> -
                    
            <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201510111724');">法律状态</a> - <a href="#this" onclick="sipolink('/Home/SipoLink/201510111724');">信息查询</a> - <a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=ZFLH%3A(G06F17%2F30(2006.01)I)' target='_blank'>同类专利</a>
            </span>
            
            
            </div>
        </div>

            <div class="PatentBlock">
            
                <div style="float:left;border:1px solid #BBBBBB;padding:2px;margin:2px 12px 2px 1px;width:82px;height:122px;" >
                </div>
                
            <div style="margin-left:104px;">
            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">
                    <input name="cb" value="7150358" type="checkbox" PatentId="7150358"  SQH='201210093345' MC='视频检索方法与装置' />[发明]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/201210093345' target='_blank'><font class='rh'>视频检索</font>方法与装置 - <font size="-1">201210093345.7</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicoinvalid" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201210093345');" style="cursor:pointer;">无权-驳回</div>
    
                <br />

            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">

            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:本发明公开一种基于音频数据的<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>的装置及其<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>方法，装置包括：视频数据库模块，用于存储视频数据；第一音视频分离模块，用于分离视频数据库模块中视频数据的音频数据；音频数据库模块，用于存储第一音视频分离模块得到的音频数据；音视频数据接收...<br></span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlockE">
            
            </span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlock">
            <img src="/content/images/patent/icon-normal.gif" class="tooltiplink" Link="/Home/Tooltip/201610339063" SQH="201610339063.9" style="padding:0px;margin:0px;"/>&nbsp;
            
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="sipolink('/Home/ViewPdfChoice/201610339063')">阅读</a> - <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="sipolink('/Home/DownloadChoice/201610339063')">下载</a> -
                    
            <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201610339063');">法律状态</a> - <a href="#this" onclick="sipolink('/Home/SipoLink/201610339063');">信息查询</a> - <a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=ZFLH%3A(G06F17%2F30(2006.01)I)' target='_blank'>同类专利</a>
            </span>

            <div class="PatentBlock">
            
                <div style="float:left;border:1px solid #BBBBBB;padding:2px;margin:2px 12px 2px 1px;width:82px;height:122px;" >

            <div style="margin-left:104px;">
            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">
                    <input name="cb" value="16589740" type="checkbox" PatentId="16589740"  SQH='201480047924' MC='高效的基于内容的视频检索' />[发明]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/201480047924' target='_blank'>高效的基于内容的<font class='rh'>视频检索</font> - <font size="-1">201480047924.5</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicopending" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201480047924');" style="cursor:pointer;">审中-实审</div>
    
                <br />
            </h2>
            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">
                申请人：<a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=SQR%3A(%22%E5%8C%B9%E6%96%AF%E5%A5%A5%E7%89%B9(%E4%BB%A5%E8%89%B2%E5%88%97)%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%22)' target=_blank>匹斯奥特(以色列)有限公司</a>  - 申请日：2014-08-18 - 主分类号：<a href='/IPC/Code/G06K9-46' target='_blank'>G06K9/46(2006.01)I</a><br />
            </span>
            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:各种公开的实施例涉及部分地基于镜头转换检测镜头转换的视频内容分析。在一些实施例中，用于检测视频中的镜头转换镜头转换的方法和计算机系统被用于将视频序列分割成一系列具有多个帧的“镜头”。然后这些镜头可用于附加处理，例如，视频帧范围内的内容检测。<br></span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlockE">
            
            </span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlock">
            <img src="/content/images/patent/icon-normal.gif" class="tooltiplink" Link="/Home/Tooltip/201480047924" SQH="201480047924.5" style="padding:0px;margin:0px;"/>&nbsp;

            <div style="margin-left:104px;">
            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">
                    <input name="cb" value="15791149" type="checkbox" PatentId="15791149"  SQH='201410359465' MC='一种基于内容的视频检索数学模型建立方法' />[发明]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/201410359465' target='_blank'>一种基于内容的<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>数学模型建立方法 - <font size="-1">201410359465.6</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicopending" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201410359465');" style="cursor:pointer;">审中-公开</div>
    
                <br />
            </h2>
            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">
                申请人：<a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=SQR%3A(%22%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E6%9E%81%E8%AA%89%E5%AE%9E%E4%B8%9A%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%22)' target=_blank>上海极誉实业有限公司</a>  - 申请日：2014-07-24 - 主分类号：<a href='/IPC/Code/G06F17-30' target='_blank'>G06F17/30(2006.01)I</a><br />
            </span>
            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:本发明公开了一种基于内容的<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>数学模型建立方法，为了解决基于内容的<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>的效率较低的问题，本发明公开的方法包括：获取待检测视频帧的特征向量；根据视频指纹库中待比较敏感视频帧特征向量的索引号，以及预定义的转换规则，查找到对应的笛卡尔坐标...<br></span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlockE">
            
            </span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlock">

            <div style="margin-left:104px;">
            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">
                    <input name="cb" value="17504146" type="checkbox" PatentId="17504146"  SQH='201610237628' MC='基于卷积神经网络的视频检索方法及系统' />[发明]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/201610237628' target='_blank'>基于卷积神经网络的<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>方法及系统 - <font size="-1">201610237628.2</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicopending" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201610237628');" style="cursor:pointer;">审中-实审</div>
    
                <br />

            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:一种安保监控<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>定位方法，先对历史<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>在视频中找到要查找的目标，连续播放含有目标的视频，并以目标所在画面作为主画面，利用拓扑关系在主画面周围以小画面形式显示与拍摄主画面的摄像机监控范围相邻的摄像机所拍摄的历史画面，当目标走出主画面监...<br></span>

            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">
                    <input name="cb" value="18773746" type="checkbox" PatentId="18773746"  SQH='201610283654' MC='基于手绘运动轮廓的视频检索方法及系统' />[发明]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/201610283654' target='_blank'>基于手绘运动轮廓的<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>方法及系统 - <font size="-1">201610283654.9</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicopending" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201610283654');" style="cursor:pointer;">审中-实审</div>

            </h2>
            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">
                申请人：<a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=SQR%3A(%22%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E4%BA%A4%E9%80%9A%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6%22)' target=_blank>上海交通大学</a>  - 申请日：2016-04-29 - 主分类号：<a href='/IPC/Code/G06F17-30' target='_blank'>G06F17/30(2006.01)I</a><br />
            </span>
            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:本发明公开了一种基于手绘运动轮廓的<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>方法及系统，所述方法步骤：在构建视频索引数据库阶段，首先对视频片段的光流场进行运动分解得到具有典型运动结构的子运动矢量场；利用运动结构编码算法对每个子运动矢量场提取运动描述子；将每个子运动矢量场的描...<br></span>

            <div style="margin-left:104px;">
            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">
                    <input name="cb" value="8917323" type="checkbox" PatentId="8917323"  SQH='201310034011' MC='一种相似视频检索的方法及系统' />[发明]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/201310034011' target='_blank'>一种相似<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>的方法及系统 - <font size="-1">201310034011.7</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicoinvalid" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201310034011');" style="cursor:pointer;">无权-驳回</div>
    
                <br />
            </h2>
            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">
                申请人：<a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=SQR%3A(%22%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E7%A7%91%E5%AD%A6%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6%22)' target=_blank>中国科学技术大学</a>  - 申请日：2013-01-29 - 主分类号：<a href='/IPC/Code/G06F17-30' target='_blank'>G06F17/30(2006.01)I</a><br />
            </span>
            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:本发明公开了一种相似<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>的方法及系统，其中，该方法包括：利用颜色空间模型计算视频库中每一视频关键帧集合的特征矢量；通过哈希函数映射所述特征矢量，根据映射后的矢量值所在区间构建索引；根据待检索视频每一运动矢量映射后的各个矢量值所在区间确定...<br></span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlockE">
            
            </span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlock">
            <img src="/content/images/patent/icon-normal.gif" class="tooltiplink" Link="/Home/Tooltip/201310034011" SQH="201310034011.7" style="padding:0px;margin:0px;"/>&nbsp;
            
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="sipolink('/Home/ViewPdfChoice/201310034011')">阅读</a> - <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="sipolink('/Home/DownloadChoice/201310034011')">下载</a> -
                    
            <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201310034011');">法律状态</a> - <a href="#this" onclick="sipolink('/Home/SipoLink/201310034011');">信息查询</a> - <a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=ZFLH%3A(G06F17%2F30(2006.01)I)' target='_blank'>同类专利</a>
            </span>
            
            
            </div>

            <div style="margin-left:104px;">
            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">
                    <input name="cb" value="19176197" type="checkbox" PatentId="19176197"  SQH='201610978434' MC='一种基于内容的视频检索方法及装置' />[发明]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/201610978434' target='_blank'>一种基于内容的<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>方法及装置 - <font size="-1">201610978434.8</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicopending" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201610978434');" style="cursor:pointer;">审中-实审</div>
    
                <br />
            </h2>
            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">

            <div style="margin-left:104px;">
            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">
                    <input name="cb" value="19416126" type="checkbox" PatentId="19416126"  SQH='201611106368' MC='一种基于多模态卷积神经网络的视频检索方法' />[发明]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/201611106368' target='_blank'>一种基于多模态卷积神经网络的<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>方法 - <font size="-1">201611106368.1</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicopending" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201611106368');" style="cursor:pointer;">审中-公开</div>
    
                <br />
            </h2>
            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">
                申请人：<a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=SQR%3A(%22%E6%B5%99%E6%B1%9F%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6%22)' target=_blank>浙江大学</a>  - 申请日：2016-12-06 - 主分类号：<a href='/IPC/Code/G06F17-30' target='_blank'>G06F17/30(2006.01)I</a><br />
            </span>
            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:本发明公开了一种基于多模态卷积神经网络的<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>方法，包括：步骤1，针对视频数据库中的视频，利用各视频中相邻帧的色彩信息特征，将各视频分割为多个子视频片段；步骤2，提取每个子视频片段的关键帧；步骤3，针对视频数据库中的视频，提取视频的视频特...<br></span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlockE">
            
            </span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlock">
            <img src="/content/images/patent/icon-normal.gif" class="tooltiplink" Link="/Home/Tooltip/201611106368" SQH="201611106368.1" style="padding:0px;margin:0px;"/>&nbsp;
            
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="sipolink('/Home/ViewPdfChoice/201611106368')">阅读</a> - <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="sipolink('/Home/DownloadChoice/201611106368')">下载</a> -

            </span>

            <div style="margin-left:104px;">
            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">
                    <input name="cb" value="11108580" type="checkbox" PatentId="11108580"  SQH='201310388597' MC='基于对象标志位的视频检索和浏览的方法和装置' />[发明]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/201310388597' target='_blank'>基于对象标志位的<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>和浏览的方法和装置 - <font size="-1">201310388597.7</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicopending" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201310388597');" style="cursor:pointer;">审中-实审</div>
    
                <br />
            </h2>
            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">
                申请人：<a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=SQR%3A(%22%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E6%A1%93%E6%B6%A6%E4%B8%96%E5%98%89%E7%A7%91%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%22)' target=_blank>北京桓润世嘉科技有限公司</a>  - 申请日：2013-08-30 - 主分类号：<a href='/IPC/Code/G06F17-30' target='_blank'>G06F17/30(2006.01)I</a><br />
            </span>
            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:本发明是有关于一种基于对象标志位的<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>和浏览的方法，包括以下步骤：S1，视频浓缩模块基于存储模块中存储的原始视频进行浓缩生成浓缩视频A，并存入存储模块；S2，对象标志位模块在步骤S1中的视频浓缩模块生成浓缩视频A的过程中，基于存储模块中...<br></span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlockE">
            
            </span>

            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">
                    <input name="cb" value="4766266" type="checkbox" PatentId="4766266"  SQH='201010145468' MC='基于目标特征和报警行为的智能视频检索系统和方法' />[发明]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/201010145468' target='_blank'>基于目标特征和报警行为的智能<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>系统和方法 - <font size="-1">201010145468.1</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicoinvalid" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201010145468');" style="cursor:pointer;">无权-视为撤回</div>

            </h2>
            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">
                申请人：<a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=SQR%3A(%22%E6%B1%9F%E8%8B%8F%E4%B8%9C%E5%A4%A7%E9%87%91%E6%99%BA%E5%BB%BA%E7%AD%91%E6%99%BA%E8%83%BD%E5%8C%96%E7%B3%BB%E7%BB%9F%E5%B7%A5%E7%A8%8B%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%22)' target=_blank>江苏东大金智建筑智能化系统工程有限公司</a>  - 申请日：2010-04-09 - 主分类号：<a href='/IPC/Code/G06F17-30' target='_blank'>G06F17/30(2006.01)I</a><br />
            </span>
            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:基于目标特征和报警行为的智能<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>系统和方法涉及一种智能<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>系统和方法,包括:轨迹跟踪模块:提取输入视频中目标的运动轨迹和报警行为;特征提取模块:提取输入图像的特征,包括颜色、纹理、形状和类别;特征存储模块:把运动轨迹、报警行为、目标...<br></span>

            <div style="margin-left:104px;">
            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">
                    <input name="cb" value="1412840" type="checkbox" PatentId="1412840"  SQH='03150126' MC='一种对镜头进行基于内容的视频检索的方法' />[发明]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/03150126' target='_blank'>一种对镜头进行基于内容的<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>的方法 - <font size="-1">03150126.5</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicovalid" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/03150126');" style="cursor:pointer;">有权</div>
    
                <br />

            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:本实用新型公开了一种基于压缩域的<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>系统，包括处理器；处理器包括码流信息提取单元、压缩域特征分析单元、压缩域特征存储单元和压缩域特征匹配单元；码流信息提取单元与压缩域特征分析单元连接，压缩域特征分析单元与压缩域特征存储单元连接，压缩域特...<br></span>

            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">
                    <input name="cb" value="6815020" type="checkbox" PatentId="6815020"  SQH='201120428559' MC='一种基于光流方法的视频检索系统' />[实用新型]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/201120428559' target='_blank'>一种基于光流方法的<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>系统 - <font size="-1">201120428559.6</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicovalid" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201120428559');" style="cursor:pointer;">有权</div>

            </h2>
            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">
                申请人：<a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=SQR%3A(%22%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E7%94%B5%E5%AD%90%E7%A7%91%E6%8A%80%E5%AD%A6%E9%99%A2%22)' target=_blank>北京电子科技学院</a>  - 申请日：2011-11-03 - 主分类号：<a href='/IPC/Code/G06F17-30' target='_blank'>G06F17/30(2006.01)I</a><br />
            </span>
            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:一种基于光流方法的<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>系统，其包括：视频镜头预处理装置，其对摄取的视频镜头进行帧分割，对每帧图像进行卷积平滑；光流特征提取器，其对每相邻的两帧图像计算像素点的光流值，进而得到光流的模长与幅角信息；视频图像帧分类器，其对视频镜头中的帧图像...<br></span>

            <div style="margin-left:104px;">
            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">
                    <input name="cb" value="19007393" type="checkbox" PatentId="19007393"  SQH='201611137782' MC='一种基于互联网的音视频识别系统及其方法' />[发明]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/201611137782' target='_blank'>一种基于互联网的音视频识别系统及其方法 - <font size="-1">201611137782.9</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicopending" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201611137782');" style="cursor:pointer;">审中-实审</div>
    
                <br />
            </h2>
            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">
                申请人：<a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=SQR%3A(%22%E5%90%88%E8%82%A5%E5%8D%8E%E8%80%80%E5%B9%BF%E5%91%8A%E4%BC%A0%E5%AA%92%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%22)' target=_blank>合肥华耀广告传媒有限公司</a>  - 申请日：2016-12-12 - 主分类号：<a href='/IPC/Code/H04N21-643(2011.01)I' target='_blank'>H04N21/643(2011.01)I</a><br />
            </span>
            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:本发明公开一种基于互联网的音视频识别系统，包括数据获取模块、数据播放模块、视频监控模块、视频存储模块、<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>模块和视频统计模块；所述数据获取模块与数据播放模块连接，所述数据获取模块包括音视频提取单元、协议分析单元、媒体解码单元和用户管理单...<br></span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlockE">
            
            </span>

            <div style="margin-left:104px;">
            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">
                    <input name="cb" value="17360358" type="checkbox" PatentId="17360358"  SQH='201410566216' MC='一种监控视频快照定位方法' />[发明]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/201410566216' target='_blank'>一种监控视频快照定位方法 - <font size="-1">201410566216.4</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicopending" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201410566216');" style="cursor:pointer;">审中-公开</div>
    
                <br />
            </h2>
            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">

            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:一种视频文件检索系统及检索方法。该<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>系统包括一输入接收模块，该输入接收模块包括图像获取子模块、模型构建子模块及控制子模块，该控制子模块响应用户输入在该图像获取子模块及模型构建子模块中选择一个作为输入检索内容的窗口，其中，该图像获取子模...<br></span>

            </span>
            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:本发明涉及基于上下文的视频查找器。本发明的实施例涉及一种用于<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>的方法,该方法通过提供第一音频视频文件,在该第一一音频视频文件中确定音乐的第一段的第一标识符,在音乐数据库中查找该第一标识符的第一元数据,其中所述第一元数据与所述第一标识符...<br></span>

            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:本发明公开了一种基于多视角的交互式视频搜索方法,属于视频搜索技术领域。本发明将多视角技术应用于交互式<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>,开发了一种基于多视角的交互式视频搜索方法。本发明以一种半监督的学习方式,从多个独立视角来构造一个新的排序函数,其优点是只需要很少的...<br></span>

<!--
    <div class='title'>SooPAT权利醒目灯</div>
    <div class='content'>
    <div class="stateico stateicovalid">有权</div>&nbsp;授权专利,且当前有专利权<br />
    <div class="stateico stateicopending">审中</div>&nbsp;发明专利公开,但尚未授权<br />
    <div class="stateico stateicoinvalid">无权</div>&nbsp;过期,无效,驳回,撤回,放弃等<br />
    </div>

    var options = {
            title: false,
            zoomWidth: 600,
            zoomHeight: 400,
            xOffset: 20,
            yOffset: -140,
            showEffect: "fadein",
            preloadText: "载入图片中",
            position: "right"
        }
        $(".jqzoom").jqzoom(options);
    });
</script>

<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META HTTP-EQUIV="Content-Type" CONTENT="text/html; charset=utf-8"> 
<TITLE>错误：您所请求的网址（URL）无法获取</TITLE>
<STYLE type="text/css"><!--BODY{background-color:#ffffff;font-family:verdana,sans-serif}PRE{font-family:sans-serif}--></STYLE>
</HEAD><BODY>
<H1>错误</H1>
<H2>您所请求的网址（URL）无法获取</H2>
<HR noshade size="1px">
<P>
当尝试进行以下请求时：
<PRE>
GET /Home/Result?SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y&amp;SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160&amp;SYXX=Y&amp;FMZL=Y&amp;SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2 HTTP/1.1
Host: www.soopat.com
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: */*
User-Agent: python-requests/2.18.1
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json

</PRE>
<P>
发生了下列的错误：
<UL>
<LI>
<STRONG>
Invalid Request
<BR>
无效的请求
</STRONG>
</UL>

<P>
Some aspect of the HTTP Request is invalid.  Possible problems:
<BR>
HTTP 请求的某些方面是无效的。可能是下列问题：
<UL>
<LI>Missing or unknown request method
<BR>缺少请求方式或未知的请求方式
<LI>Missing URL
<BR>缺少网址
<LI>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0)
<BR>缺少 HTTP 标识（HTTP/1.0）
<LI>Request is too large
<BR>请求命令过长
<LI>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests
<BR>POST 或 PUT 请求缺少内容长度
<LI>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed
<BR>主机名称中包含不合法的字符；下划线是不允许的。
<LI>Requested range is not satisfiable
<BR>请求的Range范围不合法。
</UL>
</P>
<P>本缓存服务器管理员：<A HREF="mailto:webmaster">webmaster</A>. 
<P>Via:ch227:8101 (Cdn Cache Server V2.0)</P>

<h1>ERROR</h1>
<h2>The requested URL could not be retrieved</h2>
</div>
<hr>

<div id="content">
<p><b>Invalid Request</b> error was encountered while trying to process the request:</p>

<blockquote id="data">
<pre>GET /Home/Result?SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y&amp;SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160&amp;FMZL=Y&amp;SYXX=Y&amp;SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2 HTTP/1.1
Host: www.soopat.com
Accept: */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Connection: keep-alive
User-Agent: python-requests/2.18.1
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json
</pre>
</blockquote>

<p>Some possible problems are:</p>
<ul>
<li id="missing-method"><p>Missing or unknown request method.</p></li>
<li id="missing-url"><p>Missing URL.</p></li>
<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

<p>Your cache administrator is <a href="mailto:webmaster?subject=CacheErrorInfo%20-%20ERR_INVALID_REQ&amp;body=CacheHost%3A%20localhost%0D%0AErrPage%3A%20ERR_INVALID_REQ%0D%0AErr%3A%20%5Bnone%5D%0D%0ATimeStamp%3A%20Tue,%2004%20Jul%202017%2002%3A05%3A18%20GMT%0D%0A%0D%0AClientIP%3A%20222.90.69.234%0D%0A%0D%0AHTTP%20Request%3A%0D%0AGET%20%2FHome%2FResult%3FSearchWord%3D%25E8%25A7%2586%25E9%25A2%2591%25E6%25A3%2580%25E7%25B4%25A2%26FMZL%3DY%26SYXX%3DY%26PatentIndex%3D160%26FMZL%3DY%26SYXX%3DY%26SearchWord%3D%25E8%25A7%2586%25E9%25A2%2591%25E6%25A3%2580%25E7%25B4%25A2%20HTTP%2F1.1%0AHost%3A%20www.soopat.com%0D%0AAccept%3A%20*%2F*%0D%0AAccept-Encoding%3A%20gzip,%20deflate%0D%0AConnection%3A%20keep-alive%0D%0AUser-Agent%3A%20python-requests%2F2.18.1%0D%0AContent-Length%3A%202%0D%0AContent-Type%3A%20application%2Fjson%0D%0A%0D%0A%0D%0A">webmaster</a>.</p>

    color: black;

}

    margin-left: 2%;

</pre>

</ul>

/* Page basics */
* {
	font-family: verdana, sans-serif;
}

html body {
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
	background: #efefef;
	font-size: 12px;
	color: #1e1e1e;
}

/* Page displayed title area */
#titles {
	margin-left: 15px;
	padding: 10px;
	padding-left: 100px;
	background: url('http://www.squid-cache.org/Artwork/SN.png') no-repeat left;
}

/* initial title */
#titles h1 {
	color: #000000;
}
#titles h2 {
	color: #000000;
}

/* special event: FTP success page titles */
#titles ftpsuccess {
	background-color:#00ff00;
	width:100%;
}

/* Page displayed body content area */
#content {
	padding: 10px;
	background: #ffffff;
}

/* General text */
p {
}

/* error brief description */
#error p {
}

/* some data which may have caused the problem */
#data {
}

/* the error message received from the system or other software */
#sysmsg {
}

pre {
    font-family:sans-serif;
}

/* special event: FTP / Gopher directory listing */
#dirmsg {
    font-family: courier;
    color: black;
    font-size: 10pt;
}
#dirlisting {
    margin-left: 2%;
    margin-right: 2%;
}
#dirlisting tr.entry td.icon,td.filename,td.size,td.date {
    border-bottom: groove;
}
#dirlisting td.size {
    width: 50px;
    text-align: right;
    padding-right: 5px;
}

/* horizontal lines */
hr {
	margin: 0;
}

/* page displayed footer area */
#footer {
	font-size: 9px;
	padding-left: 10px;
}

:lang(fa) { direction: rtl; font-size: 100%; font-family: Tahoma, Roya, sans-serif; float: right; }
:lang(he) { direction: rtl; }
 --></style>
</head><body id=ERR_INVALID_REQ>
<div id="titles">
<h1>ERROR</h1>
<h2>The requested URL could not be retrieved</h2>
</div>
<hr>

<div id="content">
<p><b>Invalid Request</b> error was encountered while trying to process the request:</p>

<blockquote id="data">
<pre>GET /Home/Result?SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160&amp;SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y HTTP/1.1
Host: www.soopat.com
Accept: */*
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2272.118 Safari/537.36
Connection: keep-alive
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json
</pre>
</blockquote>

<p>Some possible problems are:</p>
<ul>
<li id="missing-method"><p>Missing or unknown request method.</p></li>
<li id="missing-url"><p>Missing URL.</p></li>
<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

<p>Your cache administrator is <a href="mailto:webmaster?subject=CacheErrorInfo%20-%20ERR_INVALID_REQ&amp;body=CacheHost%3A%20localhost%0D%0AErrPage%3A%20ERR_INVALID_REQ%0D%0AErr%3A%20%5Bnone%5D%0D%0ATimeStamp%3A%20Tue,%2004%20Jul%202017%2002%3A42%3A42%20GMT%0D%0A%0D%0AClientIP%3A%20222.90.69.234%0D%0A%0D%0AHTTP%20Request%3A%0D%0AGET%20%2FHome%2FResult%3FSYXX%3DY%26PatentIndex%3D160%26SearchWord%3D%25E8%25A7%2586%25E9%25A2%2591%25E6%25A3%2580%25E7%25B4%25A2%26FMZL%3DY%20HTTP%2F1.1%0AHost%3A%20www.soopat.com%0D%0AAccept%3A%20*%2F*%0D%0AUser-Agent%3A%20Mozilla%2F5.0%20(Windows%20NT%206.3%3B%20Win64%3B%20x64)%20AppleWebKit%2F537.36%20(KHTML,%20like%20Gecko)%20Chrome%2F41.0.2272.118%20Safari%2F537.36%0D%0AConnection%3A%20keep-alive%0D%0AAccept-Encoding%3A%20gzip,%20deflate%0D%0AContent-Length%3A%202%0D%0AContent-Type%3A%20application%2Fjson%0D%0A%0D%0A%0D%0A">webmaster</a>.</p>
<br>
</div>

</script>

	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
	background: #efefef;
	font-size: 12px;
	color: #1e1e1e;
}

    color: black;
    font-size: 10pt;
}

    margin-left: 2%;
    margin-right: 2%;

<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

	background: #ffffff;

    font-family: courier;
    color: black;
    font-size: 10pt;
}

    margin-left: 2%;
    margin-right: 2%;
}

    border-bottom: groove;

<h1>ERROR</h1>
<h2>The requested URL could not be retrieved</h2>
</div>
<hr>

<div id="content">
<p><b>Invalid Request</b> error was encountered while trying to process the request:</p>

<blockquote id="data">
<pre>GET /Home/Result?SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160&amp;SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y HTTP/1.1
Host: www.soopat.com
Accept: */*
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2272.118 Safari/537.36
Connection: keep-alive
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json
</pre>
</blockquote>

<p>Some possible problems are:</p>
<ul>
<li id="missing-method"><p>Missing or unknown request method.</p></li>
<li id="missing-url"><p>Missing URL.</p></li>
<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

/* the error message received from the system or other software */
#sysmsg {
}

pre {
    font-family:sans-serif;
}

/* special event: FTP / Gopher directory listing */
#dirmsg {
    font-family: courier;
    color: black;
    font-size: 10pt;
}
#dirlisting {
    margin-left: 2%;
    margin-right: 2%;
}
#dirlisting tr.entry td.icon,td.filename,td.size,td.date {
    border-bottom: groove;
}
#dirlisting td.size {
    width: 50px;
    text-align: right;
    padding-right: 5px;
}

hr {
	margin: 0;

	font-size: 9px;
	padding-left: 10px;

</ul>

    font-size: 10pt;
}
#dirlisting {
    margin-left: 2%;
    margin-right: 2%;
}

    border-bottom: groove;
}
#dirlisting td.size {
    width: 50px;
    text-align: right;
    padding-right: 5px;

	margin: 0;

    border-bottom: groove;
}
#dirlisting td.size {
    width: 50px;
    text-align: right;
    padding-right: 5px;
}

	margin: 0;

	padding-left: 10px;

<div id="content">
<p><b>Invalid Request</b> error was encountered while trying to process the request:</p>

<blockquote id="data">
<pre>GET /Home/Result?SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160&amp;SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y HTTP/1.1
Host: www.soopat.com
Accept: */*
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2272.118 Safari/537.36
Connection: keep-alive
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json
</pre>
</blockquote>

<p>Some possible problems are:</p>
<ul>
<li id="missing-method"><p>Missing or unknown request method.</p></li>
<li id="missing-url"><p>Missing URL.</p></li>
<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

<h1>ERROR</h1>
<h2>The requested URL could not be retrieved</h2>
</div>
<hr>

<div id="content">
<p><b>Invalid Request</b> error was encountered while trying to process the request:</p>

<blockquote id="data">
<pre>GET /Home/Result?SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160&amp;SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y HTTP/1.1
Host: www.soopat.com
Accept: */*
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2272.118 Safari/537.36
Connection: keep-alive
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json
</pre>
</blockquote>

<p>Some possible problems are:</p>
<ul>
<li id="missing-method"><p>Missing or unknown request method.</p></li>
<li id="missing-url"><p>Missing URL.</p></li>
<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

<p>Your cache administrator is <a href="mailto:webmaster?subject=CacheErrorInfo%20-%20ERR_INVALID_REQ&amp;body=CacheHost%3A%20localhost%0D%0AErrPage%3A%20ERR_INVALID_REQ%0D%0AErr%3A%20%5Bnone%5D%0D%0ATimeStamp%3A%20Tue,%2004%20Jul%202017%2002%3A43%3A37%20GMT%0D%0A%0D%0AClientIP%3A%20222.90.69.234%0D%0A%0D%0AHTTP%20Request%3A%0D%0AGET%20%2FHome%2FResult%3FSYXX%3DY%26PatentIndex%3D160%26SearchWord%3D%25E8%25A7%2586%25E9%25A2%2591%25E6%25A3%2580%25E7%25B4%25A2%26FMZL%3DY%20HTTP%2F1.1%0AHost%3A%20www.soopat.com%0D%0AAccept%3A%20*%2F*%0D%0AUser-Agent%3A%20Mozilla%2F5.0%20(Windows%20NT%206.3%3B%20Win64%3B%20x64)%20AppleWebKit%2F537.36%20(KHTML,%20like%20Gecko)%20Chrome%2F41.0.2272.118%20Safari%2F537.36%0D%0AConnection%3A%20keep-alive%0D%0AAccept-Encoding%3A%20gzip,%20deflate%0D%0AContent-Length%3A%202%0D%0AContent-Type%3A%20application%2Fjson%0D%0A%0D%0A%0D%0A">webmaster</a>.</p>

<blockquote id="data">
<pre>GET /Home/Result?SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y&amp;SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160 HTTP/1.1

<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

<pre>GET /Home/Result?SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y&amp;SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160 HTTP/1.1
Host: www.soopat.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2272.118 Safari/537.36
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json
</pre>
</blockquote>

<p>Some possible problems are:</p>
<ul>
<li id="missing-method"><p>Missing or unknown request method.</p></li>
<li id="missing-url"><p>Missing URL.</p></li>
<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

<pre>GET /Home/Result?SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y&amp;SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160 HTTP/1.1
Host: www.soopat.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2272.118 Safari/537.36
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json
</pre>
</blockquote>

<p>Some possible problems are:</p>
<ul>
<li id="missing-method"><p>Missing or unknown request method.</p></li>
<li id="missing-url"><p>Missing URL.</p></li>
<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

<pre>GET /Home/Result?SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y&amp;SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160 HTTP/1.1
Host: www.soopat.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2272.118 Safari/537.36
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json
</pre>
</blockquote>

<p>Some possible problems are:</p>
<ul>
<li id="missing-method"><p>Missing or unknown request method.</p></li>
<li id="missing-url"><p>Missing URL.</p></li>
<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

<pre>GET /Home/Result?SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y&amp;SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160 HTTP/1.1
Host: www.soopat.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2272.118 Safari/537.36
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json
</pre>
</blockquote>

<p>Some possible problems are:</p>
<ul>
<li id="missing-method"><p>Missing or unknown request method.</p></li>
<li id="missing-url"><p>Missing URL.</p></li>
<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

<pre>GET /Home/Result?SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y&amp;SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160 HTTP/1.1
Host: www.soopat.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2272.118 Safari/537.36
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json
</pre>
</blockquote>

<p>Some possible problems are:</p>
<ul>
<li id="missing-method"><p>Missing or unknown request method.</p></li>
<li id="missing-url"><p>Missing URL.</p></li>
<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

<pre>GET /Home/Result?SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y&amp;SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160 HTTP/1.1
Host: www.soopat.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2272.118 Safari/537.36
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json
</pre>
</blockquote>

<p>Some possible problems are:</p>
<ul>
<li id="missing-method"><p>Missing or unknown request method.</p></li>
<li id="missing-url"><p>Missing URL.</p></li>
<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

<pre>GET /Home/Result?SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y&amp;SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160 HTTP/1.1
Host: www.soopat.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2272.118 Safari/537.36
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json
</pre>
</blockquote>

<p>Some possible problems are:</p>
<ul>
<li id="missing-method"><p>Missing or unknown request method.</p></li>
<li id="missing-url"><p>Missing URL.</p></li>
<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

<pre>GET /Home/Result?SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y&amp;SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160 HTTP/1.1
Host: www.soopat.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2272.118 Safari/537.36
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json
</pre>
</blockquote>

<p>Some possible problems are:</p>
<ul>
<li id="missing-method"><p>Missing or unknown request method.</p></li>
<li id="missing-url"><p>Missing URL.</p></li>
<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

<pre>GET /Home/Result?SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y&amp;SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160 HTTP/1.1
Host: www.soopat.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2272.118 Safari/537.36
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json
</pre>
</blockquote>

<p>Some possible problems are:</p>
<ul>
<li id="missing-method"><p>Missing or unknown request method.</p></li>
<li id="missing-url"><p>Missing URL.</p></li>
<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

<pre>GET /Home/Result?SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y&amp;SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160 HTTP/1.1
Host: www.soopat.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2272.118 Safari/537.36
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json
</pre>
</blockquote>

<p>Some possible problems are:</p>
<ul>
<li id="missing-method"><p>Missing or unknown request method.</p></li>
<li id="missing-url"><p>Missing URL.</p></li>
<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

<pre>GET /Home/Result?SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y&amp;SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160 HTTP/1.1
Host: www.soopat.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2272.118 Safari/537.36
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json
</pre>
</blockquote>

<p>Some possible problems are:</p>
<ul>
<li id="missing-method"><p>Missing or unknown request method.</p></li>
<li id="missing-url"><p>Missing URL.</p></li>
<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

<pre>GET /Home/Result?SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y&amp;SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160 HTTP/1.1
Host: www.soopat.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2272.118 Safari/537.36
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json
</pre>
</blockquote>

<p>Some possible problems are:</p>
<ul>
<li id="missing-method"><p>Missing or unknown request method.</p></li>
<li id="missing-url"><p>Missing URL.</p></li>
<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

<pre>GET /Home/Result?SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&amp;FMZL=Y&amp;SYXX=Y&amp;PatentIndex=160 HTTP/1.1
Host: www.soopat.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2272.118 Safari/537.36
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json
</pre>
</blockquote>

<p>Some possible problems are:</p>
<ul>
<li id="missing-method"><p>Missing or unknown request method.</p></li>
<li id="missing-url"><p>Missing URL.</p></li>
<li id="missing-protocol"><p>Missing HTTP Identifier (HTTP/1.0).</p></li>
<li><p>Request is too large.</p></li>
<li><p>Content-Length missing for POST or PUT requests.</p></li>
<li><p>Illegal character in hostname; underscores are not allowed.</p></li>
<li><p>HTTP/1.1 <q>Expect:</q> feature is being asked from an HTTP/1.0 software.</p></li>
</ul>

            <td><input type='checkbox' id='FMZL' name='FMZL' value='Y' checked='checked' style='vertical-align:middle' ><label for='FMZL' style='vertical-align:middle'>发明</label> <input type='checkbox' id='SYXX' name='SYXX' value='Y' checked='checked' style='vertical-align:middle' ><label for='SYXX' style='vertical-align:middle'>实用新型</label> <input type='checkbox' id='WGZL' name='WGZL' value='Y' style='vertical-align:middle' ><label for='WGZL' style='vertical-align:middle'>外观设计</label> <input type='checkbox' id='FMSQ' name='FMSQ' value='Y' style='vertical-align:middle' ><label for='FMSQ' style='vertical-align:middle'>发明授权</label> </td><td></td><td></td>
        </tr>
        </table>
        </form>
    </div>

            <p class="right">

<b>277</b>项符合<b> ( 视频检索)  AND  ( LeiXing:( FMZL OR SYXX ) )</b>的查询结果，以下是第<b>191</b>-<b>200</b>项 （搜索用时 <b>0.0359</b>秒）

<div id="PageContent" >

    <div class="PatentBlock" style="min-height:0pt;HEIGHT: auto;">

        //page.bindcluster("/Analytics/Cluster?SearchWord=%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%A3%80%E7%B4%A2&LeiXing=FMZL%2CSYXX");
        $("#patent-compare").scrollFollow({ offset: 15, container:"PageContent" });
        page.MaxRefineCount = 10;
        
    });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

            <div style="margin-left:104px;">
            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">
                    <input name="cb" value="12436471" type="checkbox" PatentId="12436471"  SQH='201310138086' MC='检索视频图像的定位方法' />[发明]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/201310138086' target='_blank'>检索视频图像的定位方法 - <font size="-1">201310138086.X</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicopending" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201310138086');" style="cursor:pointer;">审中-实审</div>
    
                <br />
            </h2>
            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">
                申请人：<a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=SQR%3A(%22%E6%9C%B1%E4%B8%96%E4%BA%A4%22)' target=_blank>朱世交</a>  - 申请日：2013-04-19 - 主分类号：<a href='/IPC/Code/G06F17-30' target='_blank'>G06F17/30(2006.01)I</a><br />
            </span>
            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:本发明公开了一种检索视频图像的定位方法，包含如下步骤：A)输入视频，从视频中的某一场景中获取局部区域特征，将其转换为局部区域特征集合，并对从该局部区域特征集合对应的时间序列中得到特征序列排序，使得该特征序列中的特征有序分布在空间球的超球面上...<br></span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlockE">
            
            </span>
            <span class="PatentBottomBlock">
            <img src="/content/images/patent/icon-normal.gif" class="tooltiplink" Link="/Home/Tooltip/201310138086" SQH="201310138086.X" style="padding:0px;margin:0px;"/>&nbsp;
            
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="sipolink('/Home/ViewPdfChoice/201310138086')">阅读</a> - <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="sipolink('/Home/DownloadChoice/201310138086')">下载</a> -
                    
            <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201310138086');">法律状态</a> - <a href="#this" onclick="sipolink('/Home/SipoLink/201310138086');">信息查询</a> - <a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=ZFLH%3A(G06F17%2F30(2006.01)I)' target='_blank'>同类专利</a>
            </span>
            
            
            </div>

            <div style="margin-left:104px;">
            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">

            </span>
            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:本发明属于<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>技术领域,具体涉及一种基于内容的视频片段检索方法。现有的基于内容的视频片段检索方法往往存在着检索精度不高,检索速度慢的问题。针对现有技术中存在的不足,本发明首次运用图论的最大匹配和最优匹配来解决这个问题。首先,通过考察相似...<br></span>

            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">
                申请人：<a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=SQR%3A(%22%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6%E8%AE%A1%E7%AE%97%E6%9C%BA%E7%A7%91%E5%AD%A6%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E6%89%80%22)' target=_blank>北京大学计算机科学技术研究所</a> <a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=SQR%3A(%22%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%8C%97%E5%A4%A7%E6%96%B9%E6%AD%A3%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E9%99%A2%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%22)' target=_blank>北京北大方正技术研究院有限公司</a>  - 申请日：2003-07-18 - 主分类号：<a href='/IPC/Code/G06T5-40' target='_blank'>G06T5/40</a><br />
            </span>
            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:本发明属于<font class='rh'>视频检索</font>技术领域,具体涉及一种基于内容的镜头检索方法。现有的基于内容的镜头检索方法往往存在着检索准确率不高的问题。针对现有技术中存在的不足,本发明首次将图论最优匹配的Kuhn_Munkres方法用于镜头检索。与现有方法相比,本发明...<br></span>

                    <input name="cb" value="12152925" type="checkbox" PatentId="12152925"  SQH='201410266735' MC='接管终端系统进行视频播放的方法和系统' />[发明]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/201410266735' target='_blank'>接管终端系统进行视频播放的方法和系统 - <font size="-1">201410266735.9</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicovalid" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201410266735');" style="cursor:pointer;">有权</div>

            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">
                申请人：<a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=SQR%3A(%22%E5%90%88%E4%B8%80%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF(%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC)%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%22)' target=_blank>合一网络技术(北京)有限公司</a>  - 申请日：2014-06-17 - 主分类号：<a href='/IPC/Code/H04N21-472(2011.01)I' target='_blank'>H04N21/472(2011.01)I</a><br />
            </span>
            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:一种接管终端系统进行视频播放的方法及系统，所述方法包括如下步骤：运行视频播放器线程，并在移动终端的显示界面上以悬浮窗的形式显示；将视频相关信息拖动到悬浮窗中，对得到的视频进行播放。其中，对视频链接或文件则拖动到播放器中直接进行播放，或者对用...<br></span>

            <div style="margin-left:104px;">
            <h2 class="PatentTypeBlock">
                <font size="-1">
                    <input name="cb" value="12147466" type="checkbox" PatentId="12147466"  SQH='201410214938' MC='一种基于人脸检索的不良视频智能检测方法' />[发明]</font>&nbsp;<a href='/Patent/201410214938' target='_blank'>一种基于人脸检索的不良视频智能检测方法 - <font size="-1">201410214938.3</font></a>
                
    <div class="stateico stateicovalid" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201410214938');" style="cursor:pointer;">有权</div>
    
                <br />
            </h2>
            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">
                申请人：<a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=SQR%3A(%22%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E7%A7%91%E5%AD%A6%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6%22)' target=_blank>中国科学技术大学</a>  - 申请日：2014-05-20 - 主分类号：<a href='/IPC/Code/G06K9-62' target='_blank'>G06K9/62(2006.01)I</a><br />
            </span>
            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:一种基于人脸检索的不良视频智能检测方法，包含三个部分共六个模块。视频人脸提取模块M1:用于对视频样本中出现的人脸进行提取。人脸性别分类模块M2:用于对M1模块的结果进行性别分类。人脸特征提取模块M3:作用是对已获取的女性人脸进行特征抽取，生...<br></span>

            </span>

    <div class="stateico stateicoinvalid" onclick="openlegalwindow('/Home/SipoLegal/201010163794');" style="cursor:pointer;">无权-视为撤回</div>
    
                <br />
            </h2>
            <span class="PatentAuthorBlock">
                申请人：<a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=SQR%3A(%22%E5%91%A8%E6%9E%97%E7%94%9F%22)' target=_blank>周林生</a> <a href='/Home/Result?SearchWord=SQR%3A(%22%E7%8E%8B%E7%A7%89%E5%BF%97%22)' target=_blank>王秉志</a>  - 申请日：2010-05-06 - 主分类号：<a href='/IPC/Code/H04N21-214(2011.01)I' target='_blank'>H04N21/214(2011.01)I</a><br />
            </span>
            <span class="PatentContentBlock">摘要:本系统为建设手机视频系统提供实用的解决方案,通过计算机信息技术,采用结构化的数据库存储、面向对象的程序开发语言,通过专用的视频管理技术、文件服务和手机客户端技术进行视频的上传、下载、采集、发布等管理;通过专用的手机客户端进行页面创建、业务绑...<br></span>
